usr.gustavo6046.lib.j2dex.input

Class TextInput

  • java.lang.Object
    • usr.gustavo6046.lib.j2dex.input.TextInput
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    KeyInputHandler

    public abstract class TextInput
extends java.lang.Object
implements KeyInputHandler
    Subclass this when dealing with text input in text fields and other similar things. This way, you have some abstraction, which you may use to deal with text inputs at a slightly higher level. You will want to implement onInput and onEnter. You might also optionally want to implement onEsc, for e.g. pop-up dialogs (which may use TextInput just to check for Esc presses, or might as well have some text input field within them themselves), or onCapsLock (for e.g. toggling the "always run" option when Caps Lock is activated).
    Author:
    Gustavo6046
